metadata.Title: CVE-2017-0862 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability in the Upstream kernel kernel. Product: Android. Versions: Android kernel. Android ID: A-36006779.

notes.Note: tyhicks> There's currently not much info available on this but the CVE description makes it sound like it affects the upstream kernel. sbeattie> in drivers/input/misc/keychord.c::keychord_write() code does not exist in upstream kernel.

criterions.comment: linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-mako: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
